definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: Please obey the rules, NOT to crowd or play around when you are touring.
sentences.chinese: 參觀遊覽時，請遵守秩序，不要擁擠打鬧。

sentences.english: The sacred place of the revolution invites a good many visitors.
sentences.chinese: 革命聖地吸引着許許多多的參觀者。

sentences.english: After we left our luggages in the hotel, then went to visit Tian'an men Square directly.
sentences.chinese: 我們把行李放到酒店後，就直接去參觀天安門。

sentences.english: Upon entering the construction, visitors have reported feeling dizzy and disorientated.
sentences.chinese: 據進入房間的參觀者說，在裏面感覺眩暈和神志不清。

sentences.english: I visited the annual Ice and Snow festival.
Enters the temple visit current affairs to take off shoes essential.
sentences.chinese: 進入寺廟參觀時務必要脫鞋。

sentences.english: I thought it would raise a smile with people at the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 我想它能給前來參觀展覽的人帶來笑容。

sentences.english: Hua Hong NEC's booth attracted and impressed many visitors.
sentences.chinese: 華虹NEC新穎別緻的展臺吸引了衆多參觀者。

sentences.english: People visit the Shwedagon Pagoda during the yellow robe weaving festival in Yangon, Burma (Myanmar).
sentences.chinese: 在緬甸傳統的直桑岱點燈節，人們參觀仰光大金塔。

sentences.english: After lunch , the group will visit macadamia nuts farm , rainbow falls and an orchid garden.
sentences.chinese: 下午參觀夏威夷農場蘭花園和彩虹瀑布。

sentences.english: You also can take some famous historcal building in the visiting item.
sentences.chinese: 你可以將一些著名的紀念性建築包括在參觀的項目中。

sentences.english: He will also visit an energy-efficient cement plant.
sentences.chinese: 他還將參觀一座有效利用能源的水泥廠。

sentences.english: Father dragged us all around the city.
sentences.chinese: 父親帶着我們參觀了整座城市。

sentences.english: It is the museum of Hallstatt, but we did not go inside.
sentences.chinese: 這是哈爾斯塔特博物館，不過我們沒有進去參觀。

sentences.english: At Lava Hot Springs in Idaho, visitors may bathe in the thermal mineral waters.
sentences.chinese: 當熱熔岩在愛德荷州爆發，參觀者可以去那裏泡溫泉。

definition: to pay a visit/to call on
to seek by inquiry or search/to call on/to visit
to look at sth with pleasure/to watch (sth marvelous)/ornamental
